resources.string: quiz
Test: Is it easy to manipulate you?

Life among people - an endless struggle for power. And the most powerful and cruel form of power is the ability to control someone else\'s opinion. All around us want this privilege: political technologists and marketers, bosses and even our close ones. Let\'s find out how independent you are from others.
Are you strongly depend on someone else\'s opinion? What do YOU think,
Oh I can easily be persuaded! All my life I suffer from this.
Sometimes I catch myself on the fact that I am yielding to advertising tricks or the pressure of my boss. No one is immune from this.
As I see myself, I don\'t depend on anyone at all.
I trust my close ones, I consult with them. But I don\'t care what others think.
Well, it\'s good that you\'ve recognized this. This is not a verdict: you can learn to fight manipulators. But first let\'s check whether everything is so bad.
You are absolutely right. We all are subjects to manipulation. Recognition of this is the first step to freedom.
You will be surprised: this is the most common opinion. Experiments show that people who think like that are most often wrong and easily change their opinion under the pressure of society.

Most people believe that they do not depend on the opinions of others. Unfortunately, your close ones can also manipulate you. And to deny that adds affects you is overconfident. Let\'s check how independent you really are.
Check your insight. What can you tell about this person from the photo,
In general, he is a good man - I can see it in his eyes
His lips are compressed and it\'s enmity on his face. Probably, you shouldn\'t trust him.
Well, I can\'t say anything. Just a regular, normal guy.
What a cold look in his eyes. Unpleasant, maybe even cruel man.
Well, I\'ve got to tell you: you are not a very astute person: this man is a famous serial killer.
Well, I\'ve got to tell you: you are pretty astute person: this man is a famous serial killer.
Really? It\'s strange. 75% of the respondents guessed he is a serial killer. And they were right.
Well, I\'ve got to tell you: you are pretty astute person: this man is a famous serial killer.
This is a educational quiz, though. So, here\'s your second chance. Now, when you know more about him, maybe you noticed some traits that you missed first,
This is strange. He looks like a nice person. You can\'t tell that he is a killer...
Well, from the other side, he does have an evil face.
I do not notice anything like this, I can not judge people by photo.
so I did not like him right away! Why should I have a second chance? disgusting man.

It\'s good that you stayed with your opinion, despite the label that I\'ve hung on a person. In fact, he is not a murderer. This is the former president of Israel, Moshe Katsav. But he can not be called a good person either. He was convicted of sexual harassment and rape. And yes, for that he was in prison.

Well, I\'ve just labeled a man, and you found a confirmation in the photo. He is not a murderer, I lied to you. This is the former president of Israel, Moshe Katsav. But he can not be called a good person either. He was convicted of sexual harassment and rape. And yes, for that he was in prison.
You are right. In any picture you can see both the hero and the villain. In fact, he is not a murderer.

To judge people from photographs is a questionable strategy. In fact, he is not a murderer. This is the former president of Israel, Moshe Katsav. But he can not be called a good person either. He was convicted of sexual harassment and rape. And yes, for that he was in prison.
Recent studies have shown that a person\'s ability to build an independent opinion directly depends on his knowledge of abstract art. What do you think about this famous painting,
The abstract picture acts on me as a Rorschach test- I immediately begin to see faces. What can I say, certainly worth a lot of money.
I think it\'s Cy Twombly, which holds in Broad Collection in Los Angeles.
Honestly,I don\'t understand anything in abstract art. Some kind of garbage.
I\'ve even seen it in San Francisco Museum of Modern Art. It\'s early Pollock, it\'s hard not to know.
These are ordinary blots from the Internet, they do not cost a penny. But it\'s good that you said your own opinion and didn\'t try to pretend that you know the author.
Good try, but you could not see it in any museum. These are ordinary blots from the Internet.
Some kind of garbage, you are right. These are ordinary blots from the Internet.
These are ordinary blots from the Internet.
Please choose one ore more answers that describe you
I get sick when I feel that I can not refuse.
When I don\'t like something, I say it without any doubt.
Before I express myself I apologize in advance.
I changed the style to please my partner.
Do you feel like you are being used by your relatives or friends
I\'ve analyzed your answers and compiled your psychological portrait. How accurate is it,

You are pretty self-critical. You have a lot of hidden opportunities that you have never used. Sometimes yours are in serious doubts whether you took the right decision or did the right thing. Limits and restrictions cause you dissatisfaction. You realized that being too openly with other people is not too wise. Some of your ambitions are quite unrealistic.
Amazing, it\'s right about me, every word.
Nonsense, not at all, I\'m completely different.
Well, not without errors but overall quite accurately.
There are some similarities, but does it say something about me?
Nothing surprising. You can say that about any person.
Let\'s face it: this description is at least partly applicable to any person.
Let\'s face it: this description is at least partly applicable to any person.
Definitely, there are some similarities. And yes, you can say that about any person. Good job!
Share your result with friends
You are an innocent victim. Although you think that you have your own opinion, society presses on you more than you think.
You are a delicate flower. You make fragile attempts to stand on your own, but it\'s very easy to convince you to change your mind.
You are tartar. You are intracable. You are very difficult to control or influence.
Please enter your name
